english.segment1: There's a familiar progression to the similar lives that we all lead. We're trying hard to become someone we can't be. You won't find grace without honesty
english.segment2: Everyone wants reality, so here it is. I believe that nobody is good, nobody is good
english.segment3: We are liars and thieves, we're destroying the peace. But we're trying, we're trying, we're trying
english.segment4: It's the same regression to the lives that we all lead. Everyone makes mistakes, but we find grace. We believe there's redemption, there's redemption
english.segment5: If you want reality, here it is. I believe that nobody is good, nobody is good, nobody is good
english.segment6: There is nothing in our blood that makes the heart beat strong enough. Apart from grace, apart from love. I believe in grace. I believe with love that we can do good. We can do good, we can do good, we can do good.
